articles.title: Maryland Apple Store Workers Become The First To Unionize In US: What They Told CEO Tim Cook
articles.content:
Employees at an Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL) retail store in Maryland have voted to join a union. As a result, the store is now the first unionized Apple Store in the U.S.
What Happened: According to the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers, 65 votes were in favor and 33 opposed to joining the union. Close to 110 employees were ...
